To lift to world-class, execute a clean, first-principles, scenario-driven four-mover block and a tight Outlook, while tightening citations and numeric anchors. EBIT ≈ 4.3%; ROIC ≈ 10.1%; forward P/E ≈ 10x; dividend yield ≈ 5%).
